verses.verse: הַדָּבָ֛ר <WH1697> had-da-Var The word אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> ha-Yah came אֶֽל־ <WH413> 'el- to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> yir-me-Ya-hu which came unto Jeremiah מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> me-'Et יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; from the LORD וּנְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֣ר <WH5019> u-ne-vu-chad-retz-Tzar when Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- king בָּבֶ֣ל׀ <WH894> ba-Vel of Babylon וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all חֵיל֡וֹ <WH2428> chei-Lo and all his army וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <WH4467> mam-le-Chot and all the kingdoms אֶרֶץ֩ <WH776> 'e-Retz of the earth מֶמְשֶׁ֨לֶת <WH4475> mem-She-let his dominion יָד֜וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do able וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all הָעַמִּ֗ים <WH5971> ha-'am-Mim, and all the people נִלְחָמִ֧ים <WH3898> nil-cha-Mim fought עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against יְרוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim against Jerusalem וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and against כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all עָרֶ֖יהָ <WH5892> 'a-Rei-ha and against all the cities לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. thereof saying

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel הָלֹךְ֙ <WH1980> ha-loCh Go וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <WH559> ve-'A-mar-ta, and speak אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH6667> tzid-ki-Ya-hu to Zedekiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta and tell אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, to him כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar him Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, the LORD הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold נֹתֵ֜ן <WH5414> no-Ten Behold I will give אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעִ֤יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir this city הַזֹּאת֙ <WH2063> haz-zoT into בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> be-Yad into the hand מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- of the king בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> ba-Vel, of Babylon וּשְׂרָפָ֖הּ <WH8313> u-se-ra-Fah and he shall burn בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> ba-'Esh. it with fire

וְאַתָּ֗ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah, you לֹ֚א <WH3808> lo You will not תִמָּלֵט֙ <WH4422> tim-ma-Let And thou shalt not escape out מִיָּד֔וֹ <WH3027> mi-ya-Do, of his hand כִּ֚י <WH3588> ki for תָּפֹ֣שׂ <WH8610> ta-Fos but shalt surely תִּתָּפֵ֔שׂ <WH8610> tit-ta-Fes, be taken וּבְיָד֖וֹ <WH3027> u-ve-ya-Do into his hand תִּנָּתֵ֑ן <WH5414> tin-na-Ten; and delivered וְֽ֠עֵינֶיךָ <WH5869> Ve-'ei-nei-cha and thine eyes אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֵינֵ֨י <WH5869> 'ei-Nei the eyes מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- of the king בָּבֶ֜ל <WH894> ba-Vel of Babylon תִּרְאֶ֗ינָה <WH7200> tir-'Ei-nah, shall behold וּפִ֛יהוּ <WH6310> u-Fi-hu with thee mouth אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- for פִּ֥יךָ <WH6310> Pi-cha to mouth יְדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> ye-dab-Ber and he shall speak וּבָבֶ֥ל <WH894> u-va-Vel to Babylon תָּבֽוֹא׃ <WH935> ta-Vo. and thou shalt go

אַ֚ךְ <WH389> 'ach Yet שְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> she-Ma' Yet hear דְּבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH6667> tzid-ki-Ya-hu O Zedekiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD עָלֶ֔יךָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-cha, concerning לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo You will not תָמ֖וּת <WH4191> ta-Mut of thee Thou shalt not die בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> be-Cha-rev. by the sword

בְּשָׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> be-sha-Lom in peace תָּמ֗וּת <WH4191> ta-Mut, [But] thou shalt die וּֽכְמִשְׂרְפ֣וֹת <WH4955> u-che-mis-re-Fot and with the burnings אֲ֠בוֹתֶיךָ <WH1> A-vo-tei-cha of thy fathers הַמְּלָכִ֨ים <WH4428> ham-me-la-Chim kings הָרִֽאשֹׁנִ֜ים <WH7223> ha-ri-sho-Nim the former אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who הָי֣וּ <WH1961> ha-Yu become לְפָנֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> le-fa-Nei-cha, which were before כֵּ֚ן <WH3651> ken so יִשְׂרְפוּ־ <WH8313> yis-re-fu- thee so shall they burn לָ֔ךְ Lach, וְה֥וֹי <WH1945> ve-Ho thee [saying] Ah אָד֖וֹן <WH113> a-Don lord יִסְפְּדוּ־ <WH5594> yis-pe-du- [odours] for thee and they will lament לָ֑ךְ <WH99999> Lach; כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for דָבָ֥ר <WH1697> da-Var the word אֲנִֽי־ <WH589> 'a-ni- I דִבַּ֖רְתִּי <WH1696> dib-Bar-ti for I have pronounced נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ne-'um- saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD ס sa-Mek

וַיְדַבֵּר֙ <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake יִרְמְיָ֣הוּ <WH3414> yir-me-Ya-hu Then Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֔יא <WH5030> han-na-Vi, the prophet אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH6667> tzid-ki-Ya-hu unto Zedekiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah אֵ֛ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim all these words הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh these בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> bi-ru-sha-Lim. in Jerusalem

וְחֵ֣יל <WH2428> ve-Cheil army מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- When the king בָּבֶ֗ל <WH894> ba-Vel, of Babylon's נִלְחָמִים֙ <WH3898> nil-cha-Mim fought עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> ye-Ru-sha-Lim, against Jerusalem וְעַ֛ל <WH5921> ve-'Al and against כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all עָרֵ֥י <WH5892> 'a-Rei and against all the cities יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah הַנּֽוֹתָר֑וֹת <WH3498> han-no-ta-Rot; that were left אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to לָכִישׁ֙ <WH3923> la-Chish against Lachish וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and עֲזֵקָ֔ה <WH5825> 'a-ze-Kah, and against Azekah כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for הֵ֗נָּה <WH2007> Hen-nah, in נִשְׁאֲר֛וּ <WH7604> nish-'a-Ru remained בְּעָרֵ֥י <WH5892> be-'a-Rei cities יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah עָרֵ֥י <WH5892> 'a-Rei of the cities מִבְצָֽר׃ <WH4013> miv-Tzar. for these defenced פ Peh

הַדָּבָ֛ר <WH1697> had-da-Var [This is] the word אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> ha-Yah came אֶֽל־ <WH413> 'el- to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> yir-me-Ya-hu that came unto Jeremiah מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> me-'Et יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> Yah-weh; God אַחֲרֵ֡י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after כְּרֹת֩ <WH3772> ke-Rot had made הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech that the king צִדְקִיָּ֜הוּ <WH6667> tzid-ki-Ya-hu Zedekiah בְּרִ֗ית <WH1285> be-Rit, a covenant אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָעָם֙ <WH5971> ha-'Am with all the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who בִּירֽוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> bi-ru-sha-Lim, which [were] at Jerusalem לִקְרֹ֥א <WH7121> lik-Ro to proclaim לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> la-Hem like דְּרֽוֹר׃ <WH1865> de-Ror. liberty

לְ֠שַׁלַּח <WH7971> Le-shal-lach go אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish That every man אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַבְדּ֞וֹ <WH5650> av-Do should let his manservant וְאִ֧ישׁ <WH376> ve-'Ish and every man אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שִׁפְחָת֛וֹ <WH8198> shif-cha-To his maidservant הָעִבְרִ֥י <WH5680> ha-'iv-Ri [being] an Hebrew וְהָעִבְרִיָּ֖ה <WH5680> ve-ha-'iv-ri-Yah or an Hebrewess חָפְשִׁ֑ים <WH2670> cha-fe-Shim; free לְבִלְתִּ֧י <WH1115> le-vil-Ti no עֲבָד־ <WH5647> 'a-vod- that none should serve בָּ֛ם bam בִּיהוּדִ֥י <WH3064> bi-hu-Di himself of them [to wit] of a Jew אָחִ֖יהוּ <WH251> 'a-Chi-hu his brother אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> 'Ish. and each

וַיִּשְׁמְעוּ֩ <WH8085> vai-yish-me-'U heard כָל־ <WH3605> chol and all הַשָּׂרִ֨ים <WH8269> has-sa-Rim Now when all the princes וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> ha-'Am and all the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> Ba-'u which had entered בַבְּרִ֗ית <WH1285> vab-be-Rit, into the covenant לְ֠שַׁלַּח <WH7971> Le-shal-lach go אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish that every one אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַבְדּ֞וֹ <WH5650> av-Do should let his manservant וְאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> ve-'Ish and every one אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שִׁפְחָתוֹ֙ <WH8198> shif-cha-To his maidservant חָפְשִׁ֔ים <WH2670> cha-fe-Shim, free לְבִלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> le-vil-Ti no עֲבָד־ <WH5647> 'a-vod- that none should serve בָּ֖ם <WH99999> bam ע֑וֹד <WH5750> od; any וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> vai-yish-me-'U themselves of them any more then they obeyed וַיְשַׁלֵּֽחוּ׃ <WH7971> vay-shal-Le-chu. and let [them] go

וַיָּשׁ֙וּבוּ֙ <WH7725> vai-ya-Shu-vu they turned אַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> 'a-cha-rei- But afterward כֵ֔ן <WH3651> Chen, after that וַיָּשִׁ֗בוּ <WH7725> vai-ya-Shi-vu, to return אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָֽעֲבָדִים֙ <WH5650> ha-'a-va-Dim and caused the servants וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַשְּׁפָח֔וֹת <WH8198> hash-she-fa-Chot, and the handmaids אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom שִׁלְּח֖וּ <WH7971> shil-le-Chu whom they had let go חָפְשִׁ֑ים <WH2670> cha-fe-Shim; free; וַיַּכְבִּישׁוּם vai-yach-bi-shum כוַֽיִּכְבְּשׁ֔וּם <WH3533> vai-yich-be-Shum, bring into bondage קלַעֲבָדִ֖ים <WH5650> la-'a-va-Dim for servants וְלִשְׁפָחֽוֹת׃ <WH8198> ve-lish-fa-Chot. and for handmaids ס sa-Mek

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- Therefore the word יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶֽל־ <WH413> 'el- to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <WH3414> yir-me-Ya-hu, came to Jeremiah מֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> me-'Et יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh from the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֥ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel אָנֹכִ֗י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi, I כָּרַ֤תִּֽי <WH3772> ka-Rat-ti I made בְרִית֙ <WH1285> ve-Rit a covenant אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with אֲב֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1> a-Vo-tei-Chem, with your fathers בְּי֨וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom in the day הוֹצִאִ֤י <WH3318> ho-tzi-'I that I brought them forth אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> o-Tam מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt מִבֵּ֥ית <WH1004> mib-Beit out of the house עֲבָדִ֖ים <WH5650> 'a-va-Dim of bondmen לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

מִקֵּ֣ץ <WH7093> mik-Ketz At the end שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> She-va' of seven שָׁנִ֡ים <WH8141> sha-Nim years תְּֽשַׁלְּח֡וּ <WH7971> te-shal-le-Chu let ye go אִישׁ֩ <WH376> 'ish every man אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אָחִ֨יו <WH251> 'a-Chiv his brother הָעִבְרִ֜י <WH5680> ha-'iv-Ri an Hebrew אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who יִמָּכֵ֣ר <WH4376> yim-ma-Cher which hath been sold לְךָ֗ le-Cha, וַעֲבָֽדְךָ֙ <WH5647> va-'a-va-de-Cha unto thee and when he hath served שֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8337> shesh thee six שָׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> sha-Nim, years וְשִׁלַּחְתּ֥וֹ <WH7971> ve-shil-lach-To thou shalt let him go חָפְשִׁ֖י <WH2670> cha-fe-Shi free מֵֽעִמָּ֑ךְ <WH5973> me-'im-Mach; with וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- did not שָׁמְע֤וּ <WH8085> sha-me-'U hearkened אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <WH1> a-vo-tei-Chem from thee but your fathers אֵלַ֔י <WH413> 'e-Lai, about וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo or הִטּ֖וּ <WH5186> hit-Tu not unto me neither inclined אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אָזְנָֽם׃ <WH241> 'a-ze-Nam. their ear
